    right="Item 5+"

>
[Cold Iron Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2798)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Cold Iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916)

</column>

---

Cold iron armor sickens certain creatures that touch it. A creature with weakness to cold iron (such as most [demons](/Traits.aspx?ID=42) and [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69)) that critically fails an unarmed attack against a creature in cold iron armor becomes [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) 1. A creature with weakness to cold iron is sickened 1 as long as it wears cold iron armor.
